note.p: Corn merchant. Son of William Sanday. Of Newark on Trent, Nottinghamshire. Later of Puddington Hall, Cheshire, and of Liverpool. JP for Cheshire. Head of S. Sanday & Co., corn merchants, Liverpool, with branches in Bombay, Karachi, New York, and Buenos Aires. President of the Liverpool Corn Trade Association, 1892–3.
Correspondence vol. 16, letter from Sam Sanday to W. B. Tegetmeier, 29 October 1868.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 August 2017)
